title: Integration & Interoperability
summary: Comprehensive integration and interoperability framework supporting healthcare standards, third-party integrations, and Health Information Exchange (HIE) participation to enable seamless data exchange and care coordination.
description:
Comprehensive integration and interoperability framework supporting healthcare standards, third-party integrations, and Health Information Exchange (HIE) participation to enable seamless data exchange and care coordination. The system implements industry-standard protocols (HL7, FHIR, DICOM, X12), provides robust API capabilities, and participates in major health information exchanges to ensure healthcare data can flow seamlessly between systems and organizations.

## Technical Architecture Components

- HL7 message processing engine
- FHIR R4 server and client
- C-CDA document generator
- DICOM image server
- X12 EDI translator
- RESTful API gateway
- Webhook delivery service
- OAuth 2.0 authorization server
- HIE connectivity layer
- API versioning and management

## Implementation Timeline

**Month 1:**
- Healthcare standards implementation (HL7, FHIR)

**Month 2:**
- API development and documentation

**Month 3:**
- Third-party integration capabilities

**Month 4:**
- HIE connectivity and participation

**Ongoing:**
- Standard updates and new integration support

## Case Study Reference

**Regional Health Information Network**

- **Challenge:** Fragmented systems, manual data exchange, interoperability gaps
- **Outcome:** 100% HL7/FHIR compliance, connected to 3 HIEs, 50+ third-party integrations
